Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, six lines of a love-song and one line of a prayer. Two fragments rejoined.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J. J. Černy and A.H. Gardiner, ‘Hieratic Ostraca’ (Oxford 1957), p. 12 and pl. XL, 6; P.Vernus, 'Chants d'amour de I'Égypte antique' (Paris, 1992), p. 94; B. Mathieu, 'La poésie amoureuse de I'Égypte ancienne', 'Bibliothèque d’Étude' 115 (Cairo 1996), p. 115 (translation of the love-song in French), note 389 (the line of prayer), and pl. 26.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393762) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393762)
